negotiator.protocol

Class StackedAlternatingOffersProtocol

  • java.lang.Object
    • negotiator.protocol.DefaultMultilateralProtocol
      • negotiator.protocol.StackedAlternatingOffersProtocol
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MultilateralProtocol

    public class StackedAlternatingOffersProtocol
extends DefaultMultilateralProtocol
    Implementation of an alternating offer protocol using offer/counter-offer.

    Protocol: 

     The first agent makes an offer
 Other agents can accept or make a counter-offer
 
 If no agent makes a counter-offer, the negotiation end with this offer.
 Otherwise, the process continues until reaching deadline or agreement.
    Author:
    David Festen, Reyhan Aydogan, Catholijn Jonker

        Default implementation returns 0 if no agreement or number of parties if agreement exists.
